title: Total Credits per Student
description: Write a query to calculate the total number of credits each enrolled student is taking. Display name and total_credits, ordered by total credits descending.
hint: Join students, enrollments, and courses. Use SUM on credits and GROUP BY student name.
solution: SELECT students.name, SUM(courses.credits) as total_credits FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY students.name ORDER BY total_credits DESC
